title: Crowdfunded Loans Helping Small Business Grow
itunes:title: Crowdfunded Loans Helping Small Business Grow
description:
Chris Tsakalakis, CEO of Kiva, discusses the global non-profit and how crowdfunding is helping small business. Lauren Sauer, Johns Hopkins University Associate Professor of Emergency Medicine, on the latest coronavirus news. Susan Berfield, Senior Investigative Reporter for Bloomberg BusinessWeek, talks about the Big Take story of the day, "First U.S. City to Back Reparations Meets Hard Reality." Mike McGlone, Commodity Strategist for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses the crypto market. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
